distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ncurses fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-19211: Fixed denial of service issue that was triggered by a NULL pointer dereference at function _nc_parse_entry (bsc#1115929).

Non-security issue fixed:

- Remove scree.xterm from terminfo data base as with this screen uses fallback TERM=screen (bsc#1103320).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In ncurses 6.1, there is a NULL pointer dereference at function _nc_parse_entry in parse_entry.c that will lead to a denial of service attack. The product proceeds to the dereference code path even after a "dubious character `*' in name or alias field" detection.
notes.title: CVE description
